NK036(chi)020:0: nye rten 'brel bsdus pa'i sgron ma dang /
NK036(chi)020:1: nyo rdor sems dmigs drug rtsa ba bcas dpe mngon na slar 'dir 'jug /
NK036(chi)020:2: sangs rgyas la yid ches skyes tsam na brgyud pa'i
NK036(chi)020:3: byin rlabs 'byung bar nges gong ma la mos pa
NK036(chi)020:4: skyes tsam na thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'byung bar nges
NK036(chi)020:5: bla ma la gdung ba skyes tsam na nyams dang
NK036(chi)020:6: byin rlabs skye bar nges snang srid chos skur shes
NK036(chi)020:7: tsam na nyon mongs rang sar grol bar nges ye
NK036(chi)020:8: grol cer bzhag gis rgyas thebs na sangs rgyas dgongs
NK036(chi)020:9: pa yin par nges lus ngag bde ba rnyed tsam
NK036(chi)020:10: na bla ma'i byin rlabs yin par nges 'khrul pa
NK036(chi)020:11: phyi rol gyi snang ba 'gags tsam na rang gi
NK036(chi)020:12: rtsol ba yin par nges de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal
NK036(chi)020:13: 'byor bdag 'khor 'das ru shan phyed pas bde zhes
